name: M.U.S.I.C
description:
My first entry for One Game a Month (http://www.onegameamonth.com): a Unity Rhythm mini-game. The theme for this month is MUSIC!

Development took 2 days (a weekend jam). I used Audacity as the sync and patterns creator utilizing its Labels export feature.

Use mouse clicks to correctly click on timing circles as they appear. Try to stay close to the rhythm.

Music: Power Glove - Motorcycle Cop https://playmaker.bandcamp.com/track/motorcycle-cop all rights belong to the author, the track is used for testing during prototyping and is not intended to be in the release game.
